trait.000.000.000.name: Fireball
trait.000.000.000.description: A ball of fire that causes fire damage to your enemies

trait.000.000.001.name: Lightning Bolt
trait.000.000.001.description: Electricity discharges and damages your enemies

trait.000.000.002.name: Waterball
trait.000.000.002.description: Capture your enemies in a water prison

trait.000.000.003.name: ArmorBoost
trait.000.000.003.description: Boost your armor protection and companions

trait.000.000.004.name: SlowTime
trait.000.000.004.description: Slow Enemies movement within its radius

trait.000.000.006.name: Spikes
trait.000.000.006.description: Giant Rocks come out fo the ground inflicting damage

trait.000.000.007.name: BlackHole
trait.000.000.007.description: Giant Hole that draws your enemies in

trait.000.000.008.name: Blizzard
trait.000.000.008.description: Freezes enemies within a raging storm

trait.000.000.010.name: Solar Flare
trait.000.000.010.description: Within the radius of the character set everything ablaze

trait.000.000.011.name: Tornado
trait.000.000.011.description: Fierce winds that shred your enemies

trait.000.000.012.name: Enrage
trait.000.000.012.description: Random enemy becomes enraged and attacks your enemies

trait.000.000.013.name: Posession
trait.000.000.013.description: Cause random enemy to start fighting for you indefinalty

trait.000.000.014.name: vines
trait.000.000.014.description: vines tangle up enemies and inflict damage

trait.000.000.015.name: poison barbs
trait.000.000.015.description: barbs tangle up enemies and inflict damage and poison
